member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Ruru.Common.Win32.RegistryAccessException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:Ruru.Common.Win32.RegistryAccessException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:Ruru.Common.Win32.RegistryAccessException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.
member.param: The that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The that contains contextual information about the source or destination.

member.name: T:Ruru.Common.Win32.IRegistryKey
member.summary: Provides access to a registry key sub keys and values.
member.remarks: This interface allows for unit testing without requiring access to the machine's registry.

member.name: M:Ruru.Common.Win32.IRegistryKey.GetBoolValue(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the boolean value represented by the value for requested name in the registry key.
member.remarks: An integer value of 1 is considered true, any other value is considered false.
member.param: The name of the value to get.
member.returns: The boolean value for the requested name in the registry key.
member.exception: when there is no value for the given name, or the value exists but it is not an integer representing a boolean.

member.name: M:Ruru.Common.Win32.IRegistryKey.GetEnumValue``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the enum value for the given name.
member.param: The name of the value to get.
member.returns: The enum value of type represented by the value for the requested name in the registry key.
member.exception: when there is no value for the given name, or the value exists but it is not an string, or it is a string value but it is not a valid value name for enum type .
member.devdoc: FxCop message CA1004 is supressed because the T parameter is used to drive the type of the method return value, so it is not possible to provide a method parameter that enables generic parameter inference.

member.name: M:Ruru.Common.Win32.IRegistryKey.GetIntValue(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the integer value for the given name.
member.param: The name of the value to get.
member.returns: The integer value for the requested name in the registry key.
member.exception: when there is no value for the given name, or the value exists but it is not an integer.

member.name: M:Ruru.Common.Win32.IRegistryKey.GetStringValue(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the string value for the given name.
member.param: The name of the value to get.
member.returns: The string value for the requested name in the registry key.
member.exception: when there is no value for the given name, or the value exists but it is not a string.

member.name: M:Ruru.Common.Win32.IRegistryKey.GetTypeValue(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the value for the given name.
member.param: The name of the value to get.
member.returns: The instance of represented by the value for the requested name in the registry key.
member.exception: when there is no value for the given name, or the value exists but it is not an string, or it is a string value but it is not a valid type name.

member.name: M:Ruru.Common.Win32.IRegistryKey.GetValueNames
member.summary: Gets the names for the values.

member.summary: Gets the sub key for the given key name.
member.param: The name fo the key to get.
member.returns: The sub key with the requested name if it exists; otherwise .
